thread.title: Great stay at Park South!
thread.title_full: Great stay at Park South! - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gail F
title: Great stay at Park South!
text:
Friendly staff, nice room, easy access to the subway, central location, wine reception on weekday evenings & a great on-site restaurant, Covina. The only small complaint was the housekeeping- we had to ask for towels & toilet paper as not enough left in the room. However, the overall experience was great and I would recommend Park South to family & friends and will return on my next stay in New York.
